id.description: Unique identifier for the meeting engagement.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the meeting engagement was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the meeting engagement was last updated.

archived.description: Indicates whether the meeting engagement is archived or not.

contacts.description: Information about the contacts associated with the meeting engagement.

deals.description: Information about the deals associated with the meeting engagement.

companies.description: Information about the companies associated with the meeting engagement.

tickets.description: Information about the tickets associated with the meeting engagement.
